title: Mental Health Nursing Education Design Utilizing Hybrid Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Flexible learning schedules and digitally supported environments for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can establish symptom assessment and nursing intervention plans for mental health patients through Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Learners can apply therapeutic communication skills to real-world scenarios through interaction with standardized patients.
Learners can enhance their ability to understand the psychological experiences and social contexts of mental health patients through film analysis.

resources: Mental Health-Related Films and Analysis Materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
